charges.charge_disposition: J&;C of 3-16-98: BOP of 42 months to run consecutively to any other federal or state sentence as to this defendant; deft. is remanded to USM; 36 months supervised release w/conditions; special assessment of $ 100.00, fine of $ 1,993.00 WITH interest at the lawful rate-all financial penalties are due in full/immediately; statement of reasons. cc: USA, USPO-3, USM-3, PTS, fine center, Sharon, FPD, Br. Cr. Ob. 10 Pg. 125 (1)

charges.charge_description: Escape from the custody of the Federal Bureau of Prisons at FPC Seymour Johnson in Goldsboro, NC after being confined to that institution by the Attorney General of the United States in violation of Title 18, USC 751(a) [5:97-m-883]
